description: Toolitp for the button that shows actions that can be performed on a list
Generic error message displayed when it's not possible to update or delete a list
Generic success message displayed when a list is updated or deleted
Label for the title input when renaming a list
Generic label for a button or link for a user to press when they wish to abort an in-progress operation
A message that appears when a user tries to delete a list, warning them that it will affect other users in their workspace.
defaultMessage: Are you sure? This is shared among all users of {teamName}. After deleting it, no user will be able to access it.

description: Warning displayed on edit feed page when no list is selected.
defaultMessage: Deleting list will result in no content for the following shared feeds:

description: A message that appears when a user tries to delete a list, warning them that it will affect other users in their workspace.
defaultMessage: Are you sure? This is shared among all users of {teamName}. After deleting it, no user will be able to access it.
